Our Farm

New Barn Construction

We have recently completed the building of a brand-new barn to concentrate on breeding our ducks! Equipped with a lot of automation to fill/empty duck troughs as well as siphoning water from our nearby lake, this makes our lives a lot simpler at the barn.
